title: This Thread is About Lowkey OP
body:
What do you all think is lowkey OP?

as far as items go....

I think Sterak's is secret freelo. it even manages to make Olaf usable.

Deadman's is still OP, but it is so cringe to buy because of all the nerfs...

Guinsoo still broken, but people are less annoying about it...

as far as champs go...

there are no lowkey OP champs... people complain about any and every champ for good and bad reasons, but that being said... you can't be secretly OP when people are complaining about you.

thoughts?
